name: Vacumator
description:
This is a game about companionship with AI.

Short description

Vacumator searches for free path to move but doesn't know where to go. That's where you come in. Your goal is to place direction switch blocks in such order that they  will take Vacumator to his charger and in the way you should collect all the dust too.

Before you press play Vacumator shows its starting direction

Bugs and notes

The game may have bugs here and there because I couldn't make some things in time. 

Settings don't work. You can't turn off sounds or music if you wanted to

Controls and how to play

Remember Vacumator is searching for a path in clockwise order and goes to the first empty tile that is available. 

Place your blocks is such order that when it goes to that path the block will direct it to its goal.

  • Choose direction switch tool from toolbar and place it on grid
  • While hovering on a tile with direction switch block press R to rotate it
  • Hold RMB to move camera (pan)
  • Mouse wheel to zoom
  • Press play mode to activate vacumator
